SELECT B.FREEBOARD_NO, B.TITLE, M.UNO, M.U_NAME, B.CONTENT, B.FILE_ORIGINAL, B.FILE_RENAMED, B.COUNT, B.POST_DATE, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.STATUS, R.COMMENT_NO AS R_COMMENT_NO, R.FREEBOARD_NO AS R_FREEBOARD_NO, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, M2.UNO AS R_UNO, M2.U_NAME AS R_U_NAME, R.POST_DATE AS R_POST_DATE, R.STATUS AS R_STATUS FROM COMM_FREEBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN FREEBOARD_COMMENT R ON(B.FREEBOARD_NO = R.FREEBOARD_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.UNO = M2.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.U_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY B.FREEBOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_FREEBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.U_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY B.FREEBOARD_NO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT B.FREEBOARD_NO, B.TITLE, M.UNO, M.U_NAME, B.CONTENT, B.FILE_ORIGINAL, B.FILE_RENAMED, B.COUNT, B.POST_DATE, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.STATUS, R.COMMENT_NO AS R_COMMENT_NO, R.FREEBOARD_NO AS R_FREEBOARD_NO, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, R.POST_DATE AS R_POST_DATE, R.STATUS AS R_STATUS FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM COMM_FREEBOARD B ORDER BY COUNT DESC) WHERE 4 > ROWNUM) B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN FREEBOARD_COMMENT R ON(B.FREEBOARD_NO = R.FREEBOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.POST_DATE > SYSDATE-7
